categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic organizations

nodes.text: Procurement and Supply was a branch of the Rebel Alliance that worked to free material from Imperial-occupied worlds. Individuals working for Procurement and Supply included SpecForces Technicians (from the 7th Regiment) known as "Procurement Specialists" or "Scroungers." Winter served as a Procurement Specialist on Averam and other worlds under the alias "Targeter." Procurement specialists who specialized in acquiring ordnance were known as "Ordnance Procurers."
